TMC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 21 Medical Officer, Pharmacist and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 07, 2025, 10:20 IST
 Tata Memorial Centre
 21 Jobs |  Posted On : 07-Aug-2025 |  Bihar |  Salary : 15,000 to 100,000




FOLLOW

The Tata Memorial Centre (TMC) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 21 Medical Officers, Pharmacist, Clerk, Technicians, Store-in-Charge, Assistant Fire and Safety, Project Admin In-Charge, and Multi-Tasking Staff Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, D. Pharm, B.Pharm, 10th Pass, Diploma, Post Graduation, ITI, or Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the given venue. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Bihar

TMC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Medical Officer	01	MBBS
Pharmacist	01	D. Pharm, B.Pharm
Clerk	03	Any Degree
Technician	02	10th Pass, Diploma
Store-in-Charge	01	Post Graduation, Any Degree
Assistant Fire and Safety	01
Project Admin In-Charge	01	Any Degree
Multi-Tasking Staff 	11	10th Pass

Age Limit for the TMC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the TMC Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the TMC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 15,000 /- per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 1,00,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the TMC Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Medical Officer Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the interview along with the relevant documents at the address given below.

Venue

HBCH Darbhanga under the project funded by M/s Health Department, Government of Bihar

Important Dates

Starting Date of Interview	18-08-2025
Last Date of Interview	25-08-2025
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
